Articles.Content:
Okay. We know that Kerbal need food to work. But. If KSP2 has food will they give in food names. And if there are names for Kerbal food what would they be? What would be some kerbal food the devs might add in KSP2? I’m not talking about micro managing but like a experiment like: Eating in space: We ate a burrito. It floated into bits ruining all the buttons and rounding my shirt. (Example). You know what I mean right?

Edited October 16, 2020 by Dr. Kerbal
I think snacks will just do. of course they don't want the colonies to be a chore to operate so I'm pretty sure it will be an overall kind of thing. Where like in KSP 1 we saw snack compartments.

1 hour ago, Dr. Kerbal said:

Okay. We know that Kerbal need food to work. But. If KSP2 has food will they give in food names. And if there are names for Kerbal food what would they be? What would be some kerbal food the devs might add in KSP2? I’m not talking about micro managing but like a experiment like: Eating in space: We ate a burrito. It floated into bits ruining all the buttons and rounding my shirt. (Example). You know what I mean right?

SNACKS!

Kerchenlata: Kerbal Enchalata

Kurrito: Kerbal Burrito

Kerbandaga: Kerbal Albangdegas

Kurger: Kerbal Burder

Kice Kream: Kerabl icecream

Keaweed: Seaweeed

Krilled Kreese = grilled Cheese

Kreeses Pieces = Copyright Infringment

Kerb Kat = Kit kat

And the list goes on!

72%* of Kerbals prefer Kerlogg’s kereals, with approximately equal numbers choosing Korn Flakes, Koko Pops and Krunchy Nut Klusters as their number one pick to start their day. A few voted for Kookie Krisp, one picked kranola (yeah right, Bobak!) and Gene voted for a steaming hot mug of koffee, which is odd as we didn’t even put ‘a steaming hot mug of koffee’ on the survey...

Kesadillas, kalzones, king prawns (hang on...), deep fried Duna bars- get these and many more recipes in “The Kerbal’s Kookbook”, free in this week’s Kosmopolitan magazine!

But seriously though, it’s probably going to be just ‘food’.

Ahem

Kerbal Space Ice Cream For 10 Funds Only.

11 hours ago, Dr. Kerbal said:

Kerbal pops?

Isn't that what happens when you run out of power with TAC:LS?
Just so long as it's not Soylent Green.

Kernals
